channel.title: Real-Scape Economy + PKING
channel.description:
[center][img]http://real-scape.com/rl/banner.png[/img]
[center][B][SIZE=7]Features:[/SIZE] * VPS hosted, online 24/7 * Great economy * Great community * Great PKing * All Skills working * The Old-school skills * PK armor, dragon claws, chaotic's * Near perfect combat * Combat rates: 6000xp a hit * Skill rates: 40-60x runescape rates * Auto-Vote system * EP system * Curses * Many teleports * Many bosses * Very stable
[code]Recent Updates: (Newest updates towards the bottom, by date.) * 11/01/2012: Server was put online. * 11/01/2012: New home, and reorganize. Shops updated. * 11/02/2012: Added Highscores on website. * 11/08/2012: Added Gold Points, Gold Membership, Auto Voting System, and Gold Point Shop. * 11/13/2012: Worked on smithing options. * 11/15/2012: Re-did smelting options, allowing smelting with options: 1, 5, 10, 28, x.[/code]
[B][SIZE=7]Links:[/SIZE] [SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://real-scape.com/play.html"]PlayNow[/URL] [URL=http://"http://real-scape.com/forums"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://real-scape.com/"]Home[/URL][/SIZE]
[center][B][SIZE=7]Pictures:[/SIZE][/B][/center] [img]http://real-scape.com/rl/1.png[/img]
[img]http://real-scape.com/rl/2.png[/img]
[img]http://real-scape.com/rl/3.png[/img]
[img]http://real-scape.com/rl/4.png[/img]
[img]http://real-scape.com/rl/5.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=7]HOPE TO SEE YOU ONLINE![/SIZE][/B][/center]

item.title: Real-Scape Economy + PKING
item.dc:creator: @codwalkers codwalkers
item.description:
@codwalkers wrote:

Good job. I think its best when you don’t use a leeched trisidia X source like most. Great job i will play IGN: Syndicate

item.title: Real-Scape Economy + PKING
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:468191”][quote author=mgl link=topic=585153.msg4158733#msg4158733 date=1352863442]

  • A old-school type game play, with the new items
    [/quote]

No, this is NOT old school. Maybe It’s old school for your generation, but it isn’t truly old school. Make a Developmental Log so others can see what you’ve actually done yourself. This way Members will recognize that it isn’t unedited.[/quote]

Read full topic

* A old-school type game play, with the new items

No, this is NOT old school. Maybe It’s old school for your generation, but it isn’t truly old school. Make a Developmental Log so others can see what you’ve actually done yourself. This way Members will recognize that it isn’t unedited.

item.title: Real-Scape Economy + PKING
item.dc:creator: @mgl mgl
item.description:
@mgl wrote:

[center]

[center][B][SIZE=7]Features:[/SIZE]

  • VPS hosted, online 24/7
  • Great economy
  • Great community
  • Great PKing
  • All Skills working
  • The Old-school skills
  • PK armor, dragon claws, chaotic’s
  • Near perfect combat
  • Combat rates: 6000xp a hit
  • Skill rates: 40-60x runescape rates
  • Auto-Vote system
  • EP system
  • Curses
  • Many teleports
  • Many bosses
  • Very stable

[code]Recent Updates: (Newest updates towards the bottom, by date.)

  • 11/01/2012: Server was put online.
  • 11/01/2012: New home, and reorganize. Shops updated.
  • 11/02/2012: Added Highscores on website.
  • 11/08/2012: Added Gold Points, Gold Membership, Auto Voting System, and Gold Point Shop.
  • 11/13/2012: Worked on smithing options.
  • 11/15/2012: Re-did smelting options, allowing smelting with options: 1, 5, 10, 28, x.[/code]
